body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Fees & Passes              Fees & Passes        In recognition of the Centennial Anniversary of the National Park Service, Bent's Old Fort National Historic Site will not collect Living History fees during the 2016 calendar year, but donations to support the Living History Program will be greatly appreciated.  As a result of being a "Fee Free" Park in 2016, Bent's Old Fort NHS will not have any of the Interagency Passes available to the public for the duration of the No Fee Period.  These passes may be obtained at other fee collecting parks, the Comanche National Grasslands Office in La Junta or at various offices of the U.S. Fish and Wildlife Service, U.S. Forest Service, U.S. Bureau of Reclamation and Bureau of Land Management or U.S. National Park Service.
